DOC.brief_title: Study GSK Biologicals ' Influenza Vaccine Arepanrix™ Japanese Adults 65 Years Age Older

Female subject nonchildbearing potential may enrol study . Nonchildbearing potential define current tubal ligation , hysterectomy , ovariectomy postmenopause . Use investigational nonregistered product ( drug vaccine ) within 30 day precede dose study vaccine , plan use study period . History previous administration pandemic H1N1 vaccine . Presence significant acute chronic , uncontrolled medical psychiatric illness . Presence evidence substance abuse neurological psychiatric diagnosis , although stable , deemed investigator render potential subject unable/unlikely provide accurate safety report . Presence axillary temperature > = 37.5 °C , acute symptom great `` mild '' severity schedule date vaccination . Diagnosed cancer , treatment cancer within three year . Any confirm suspected immunosuppressive immunodeficient condition include history human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection . Persons receive individual dos low molecular weight heparin outside 24 hour prior vaccination eligible . Administration vaccine within 30 day vaccination plan administration blood sample Day 21 within 30 day prior blood sample Day 182 .
